Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) is a widely used tool for characterization of fuel cells and other electrochemical conversion systems.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When applied to the on-line monitoring in the context of infield applications, the disturbances, drifts and sensor noise may cause severe distortions in the evaluated spectra, especially in the low-frequency part.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Failure to ignore the random effects can result in misinterpreted spectra and, consequently, in misleading diagnostic reasoning.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This fact has not been often addressed in the research so far.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, we propose an approach to the quantification of the spectral uncertainty, which relies on evaluating the uncertainty of the equivalent circuit model (ECM).
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We apply the computationally efficient variational Bayes (VB) method and compare the quality of the results with those obtained with the Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) algorithm.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Namely, MCMC algorithm returns accurate distributions of the estimated model parameters, while VB approach provides the approximate distributions.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By using simulated and real data we show that approximate results provided by VB approach, although slightly overoptimistic, are still close to the more realistic MCMC estimates.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A great advantage of the VB method for online monitoring is low computational load, which is several orders of magnitude lower compared to MCMC.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance of VB algorithm is demonstrated on a case of ECM parameters estimation in a 6 cell solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The complete numerical implementation for recreating the results can be found at https://repo.ijs.si/lznidaric/variational-bayes-supplementary-material.
Titulo: Evaluating uncertainties in electrochemical impedance spectra of solid oxide fuel cells
